H0.text: Digestive is the human organ system that produces most of the hormones that regulate body functions.

H1.text: The nervous system is the human organ system that produces most of the hormones that regulate body functions.

H2.text: Muscular is the human organ system that produces most of the hormones that regulate body functions.

H3.text: Endocrine is the human organ system that produces most of the hormones that regulate body functions.

A4.text: The endocrine system comprises feedback loops of hormones that are released by internal glands directly into the circulatory system and that target and regulate distant organs.
